tasks.task: Strip the fruit from the trees.
subtasks: Climb the tree.
Reach into the branches to grasp the fruit.
Twist the fruit to dislodge it.
Grab the fruit with hands.
Pull the fruit downward from the tree.
Place the fruit into the basket or bag.
Lift the body using legs and core muscles.
Move along the path using leg muscles.
Hold the basket or bag at the opening.
Lean the basket or bag into the container or holding area.
Pour the fruit from the basket into the larger container.
Turn around, moving backward or forward.
Step towards or away from the tree.
